mapper.select: SELECT c.*, i.id AS item_id, i.catalog_id AS item_catalog_id, i.title AS item_title, i.brief AS item_brief, i.description AS item_description, i.icon AS item_icon, i.created_at AS item_created_at, i.updated_at AS item_updated_at FROM public_service_catalogs c LEFT OUTER JOIN public_service_items i ON c.id = i.catalog_id
